name: Snap the Line
overview: Only Primary Objectives score. Secondary Objectives help maintain battlefield presence through healing and resilience.
primary_objectives: Each Primary Objective controlled at the end of the round scores 2 Victory Points.
secondary_objectives:
If controlled at the start of your turn, you may do one of the following:
– Heal 1 Wound on a figure within 3".
– Give a nearby figure +1 Grit until the end of the round.
special_rules: Secondary Objectives cannot be scored but may be contested normally.
